philosophy.title: ELEVATE YOUR ENERGY AND INNER STRENGTH.

hero.subtitle: A JOURNEY TO YOUR WELL-BEING AND FITNESS
hero.description:
At Spin8, people are meeting a new community that connects on the same frequency, loves music and movement.

This movement is known worldwide as "wellness clubbing" or "soft clubbing": pop-up social events that bring together rhythm, light, music, and movement. Instead of traditional nightlife, a more conscious, more energetic, and better-feeling alternative is emerging — and Spin8 is at the center of this transformation.

This isn't just cycling…

This is a new generation of night culture.

More conscious, higher frequency, more powerful.

sharedJourney.title: We may have different goals, but we share the same journey.
sharedJourney.description: We inspire and empower you to achieve your fitness and well-being goals through an indoor cycling journey where the momentum, focus, and motivation are all shared in community.

tailoredApproach.title: Tailored Approach
tailoredApproach.description:
At Spin8 Studio, each instructor brings their own unique touch to every class.

Through carefully crafted personal playlists and choreographies, every session has its own special mood and energy.

Whether you want to get swept away by the rhythm of a high-tempo, sweat-inducing ride, or balance your body with a more fluid and rhythmic session… Spin8's variety ensures you'll always find the class that best matches your spirit and energy.

mission.title: MISSION
mission.description: Spin8's mission is to provide a transformative indoor cycling experience that enables people to unlock their potential, overcome their mental barriers, and achieve their goals.

vision.title: VISION
vision.description: Spin8's vision is to be recognized as an inclusive and empowering environment where people can discover their inner strength, embrace wellness culture, and find motivation. Here, everyone feels they belong, meets at the same energy level, and moves forward in the same rhythm.

community.title: COMMUNITY
community.description: The new lifestyle focuses on feeling better. At Spin8, classes transform into an experience that refreshes both body and mind through rhythm, pedals, and high energy. Spin8's goal is to create an inclusive community where everyone can feel comfortable. Whatever your goal may be, we all share the same journey here. Many people now prefer studios where they can move to the rhythm and release stress in environments that make them feel good, rather than going out at night and consuming their energy.

empowerment.title: EMPOWERMENT
empowerment.description: Spin8 offers an environment that creates awareness both mentally and physically. This space creates an experience that motivates you, empowers you, and helps you overcome all obstacles by discovering your own potential. Every class is designed to bring out the strength within you and take you even further.

wellness.title: WELLNESS
wellness.description: We are not all about physical strength, we prioritize the overall wellness of our customers by addressing their mental and emotional well-being through our shared journey.

professionalism.title: PROFESSIONALISM
professionalism.description: At Spin8, all instructors are carefully selected for their professionalism, patience, and supportive approach. Every class is designed so that members can reach their goals safely and with proper guidance.

terms.contact: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Spin8 Studio's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

section2.title: Use License
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access the materials on Spin8 Studio's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.

section3.title: Membership
section3.content: Membership packages are subject to availability and may be modified or discontinued at any time. All purchases are final unless otherwise stated.

section4.title: Class Bookings
section4.content: Classes must be booked in advance through our booking system. Cancellations must be made at least 12 hours before the scheduled class time to avoid forfeiting credits.

section5.title: Credits and Packages
section5.content: Credits are non-refundable and non-transferable. Package validity periods apply as specified at the time of purchase. Expired credits cannot be reinstated.

section6.title: Health and Safety
section6.content: Participants must inform instructors of any medical conditions, injuries, or limitations before class. Spin8 Studio is not liable for injuries resulting from failure to disclose relevant health information.

section7.title: Age Requirements
section7.content: Participants must be at least 16 years of age. Participants under 18 must have parental consent and supervision.

section8.title: Cancellation Policy
section8.content: Spin8 Studio reserves the right to cancel classes due to unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, credits will be refunded or alternative arrangements will be made.

section9.title: Refund Policy
section9.content: All sales are final. Refunds may be considered on a case-by-case basis for exceptional circumstances, subject to management approval.

section10.title: Code of Conduct
section10.content: All members must respect the studio environment, instructors, and fellow participants. Disruptive behavior may result in removal from class and termination of membership.

section11.title: Personal Belongings
section11.content: Spin8 Studio is not responsible for lost or stolen personal belongings. Lockers are available for use at your own risk.

section12.title: Photography and Media
section12.content: Photography and video recording during classes may be restricted. Spin8 Studio may use photos and videos for promotional purposes unless you opt out in writing.

section13.title: Privacy Policy
section13.content: Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described.

section14.title: Modifications
section14.content: Spin8 Studio reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

section15.title: Governing Law
section15.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Turkey. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Turkish courts.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Spin8 Studio
faq.contact: Still have questions? Contact us and we'll be happy to help!

q1.question: What should I bring to my first class?
q1.answer: Please bring a water bottle, a towel, and wear comfortable workout clothes. We provide cycling shoes, but you're welcome to bring your own if you prefer.

q2.question: Do I need to book classes in advance?
q2.answer: Yes, we recommend booking classes in advance through our online system to secure your spot. Classes can fill up quickly, especially during peak hours.

q3.question: What is the cancellation policy?
q3.answer: You can cancel your class booking up to 12 hours before the scheduled time without losing your credit. Cancellations made less than 12 hours before class will result in credit forfeiture.

q4.question: Are there different difficulty levels?
q4.answer: Our classes are designed to accommodate all fitness levels. Instructors provide modifications and encourage you to work at your own pace. Each class can be adjusted to your fitness level.

q5.question: How do credits work?
q5.answer: Credits are used to book classes. Different packages offer different numbers of credits. Credits are valid for a specific period as stated in your package terms.

q6.question: Can I transfer my credits to someone else?
q6.answer: No, credits are non-transferable and tied to your account. They cannot be shared or transferred to other members.

q7.question: What happens if I'm late to class?
q7.answer: If you arrive more than 5 minutes late, your spot may be given to someone on the waitlist. We recommend arriving 10-15 minutes early to set up your bike.

q8.question: Do you offer trial classes?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer trial classes for first-time visitors. Please contact us to schedule your trial class and experience what Spin8 has to offer.

q9.question: What age do I need to be to participate?
q9.answer: Participants must be at least 16 years old. Participants under 18 require parental consent and may need supervision depending on the circumstances.

q10.question: How do I purchase a package?
q10.answer: You can purchase packages through our website's pricing page. Simply select the package that suits you, add any coupon codes if applicable, and complete your purchase. You'll receive credits immediately after payment.
